Sentencas: The chemical stability of perovskite-type La1-xCaxCrO3-delta (x = 0. 1, 0.2, 0.3) in high oxygen partial pressure, Po-2, was investigated with three methods: thermogravimetry, XRD analysis, and thermodynamic calculation.
Titulo: Phase stability of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ in oxidizing atmosphere

Sentencas: The second phase, CaCrO4 was observed by XRD analysis on the powder equilibrated in high PO2.
Titulo: Phase stability of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ in oxidizing atmosphere

Sentencas: Thermogravimetry under fixed temperatures sensitively detected the segregation of the second phase in the form of oxygen incorporation, because oxidation of chromium ion accompanies the segregation.
Titulo: Phase stability of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ in oxidizing atmosphere

Sentencas: The second phase tended to appear in high PO2 and at low temperature.
Titulo: Phase stability of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ in oxidizing atmosphere

Sentencas: The single-phase regions of La1-xCaxCrO3-delta obtained from the two experimental methods well agreed with each other.
Titulo: Phase stability of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ in oxidizing atmosphere

Sentencas: The results of thermodynamic calculation on the assumption of ideality of the solid solution also agreed with the experimental results.
Titulo: Phase stability of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ in oxidizing atmosphere

Sentencas: These results suggested the sufficient chemical stability of La1-xCaxCrO3-delta in high Po-2 concerning the application to an interconnector of high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells; for example, La0.7Ca0.3CrO3-delta is stable at 1273 K in air.
Titulo: Phase stability of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ in oxidizing atmosphere
